name: 數學思考與過程研究（一）
goals: 探討數學思考與過程的特質
能認識與比較不同型態的數學思考與過程
能辨識數學思考與過程的相關研究問題
認識數學思考與過程的理論與實務
syllabus:
**I. Purpose**

1\. To know thinking and understanding in mathematics

2\. To know studies on language and thought in mathematics

3\. To study mathematical thinking

**II. Outline**

1\. Introduction

2\. Probing thinking (R6)

3\. Motivated thinking (R5)

4\. Mathematical cognition (R5)

5\. Representation and knowledge (R1)

6\. Mathematical activity and semiotic representations (R1)

7\. Cognitive functioning of mathematical thinking (R1)

8\. Mid-term presentations

9\. Mid-term reports

10\. Mathematical understanding (R3)

11\. Mathematical understanding (R9)

12\. Registers, representation and understanding (R1, R8)

13\. Language and mathematics (R7, R10)

14\. Development of thinking (R5)

15\. Mental models and thoughts (R5)

16\. Reasoning (R5, R11)

17\. Learning to think (R5, R2, R4)

18\. Final Presentation and Report
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
